TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "diamond_ore", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "cyan_concrete_powder", "quantity": 49, "index": 20}, {"type": "tnt", "quantity": 51, "index": 22}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "yellow_terracotta", "quantity": 23, "index": 28}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 33, "index": 31}, {"type": "nether_wart", "quantity": 44, "index": 33}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral_block", "quantity": 42, "index": 36}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "pink_concrete", "quantity": 7, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a diamond_shovel, I need to craft a diamond. To craft a diamond, I need to smelt the diamond_ore at slot 13 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 13 to slot 11 with quantity 1
